name: Don't Get Eaten By Dragons!
description:
Don't Get Eaten By Dragons! 

Created by ForestLF

2D Shooter project for Michigan State University's 'Game Design and Development with Unity 2020 Specialization' offered by Coursera.

Modifications:

  • Re-textured all sprites
  • Changed sounds
  • Built levels
  • Changed UI interface
  • Created new enemies
